name: Versailles 1685
description:
This script will install "Versailles 1685" CD edition for ScummVM.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
content:
game:
  game_id: versailles
  path: $GAMEDIR/Versailles 1685/
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert "Versailles 1685" CD 1
    requires: DATA_V/CDVER1.BIN
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Versailles 1685/DATA_V/
    src: $DISC/DATA_V/
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Versailles 1685/
    src: $DISC/INSTALL/VERSAILL.PGM
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert "Versailles 1685" 2
    requires: DATA_V/CDVER2.BIN
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Versailles 1685/DATA_V/
    src: $DISC/DATA_V/
